CustomField.description: This is the status of the My Genome order from Veritas.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sent To Veritas = Order sent to Veritas. Lab Info Sent To Veritas = Sample info sent to Veritas. Sent Customer Consent Email = Order sent, consent email sent to patient. New Order = Order created on Veritas Genetics, account created, email info is sent to patient. Registered = Sample id assigned to order with sample type, collection date. Received = Sample received in lab and passed Lab QC. Distributed = Report generated and available for patient, email sent to patient.
CustomField.label: My Genome Order Status
